page.title: 03Transport
page.content: Survey of Leiceter road roundabout. ======================== Brownsover end, 2 minutes, 10 cars. Motorway end, 13 cars, 1 minute. Swift valley end, 10 cars, 8 minutes. Rugby end, 17 cars, 2 minutes. Survey of 50 cars altogether took 13 minutes. 359 cars used the roundabout between 2.06 pm and 2.24 pm. There were 8 "B" registrations, 46 petrol cars, 4 diesels, 29 privately owned cars and 21 industrial vehicles. There were also 3 motorbikes in the time. As it is in the centre of three industrial estates the roundabout is in constant use. Saplings have recently been planted around the roundabout. The roundabout was built in 1984 for the industrial estates and the motorway.
